metadata.Title: CVE-2021-28994 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: kopano-ical (formerly zarafa-ical) in Kopano Groupware Core through 8.7.16, 9.x through 9.1.0, 10.x through 10.0.7, and 11.x through 11.0.1 and Zarafa 6.30.x through 7.2.x allows memory exhaustion via long HTTP headers.

criterions.comment: kopanocore: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
